original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ministry of Public Administration Home Affairs Provincial Councils and Local Government has declared June 30, 2023 to be a Special Bank Holiday.
UPDATE: President Putin in a special address to the nation said “Russia’s future is at stake”, as the mutinous Wagner mercenary army threatened to march on Moscow
UPDATE: President Putin to address nation as mutinous Wagner mercenary army claims control of southern city of Rostov and threatens to march to Moscow
Russian mercenary Wagner Group mutinies and marches into Russian city of Rostov
Do not pay money to any external party for nursing jobs in Israel, Foreign Employment Bureau warns
16-hour water cut in several areas of Colombo on Saturday (24)
